page.title: 13WATLING STREET
page.content: This main{A5 Trunk Road}follows the old Roman route between London & Shrewsbury, hence its name. Where 5 roads meet is the{Cross in Hand round- {about,}connecting{transport}with roads to Lutterworth, Mkt.Harborough, Rugby, Coventry, Hinckley & Nuneaton. The{Moorbarns Motel}Watling Street, offers a first class restaurant in traditional surroundings and motel accommodation in twin-bedded chalet rooms in the grounds. Dinner dances are often held at the weekend. A good centre for{touring}the Heart of England, Warwick & Stratford-on-Avon. The site was previously used as a Petrol service station, the only one in the block.
